definitions.text: a sign of assent or salutation or command
the act of nodding the head
lower and raise the head, as to indicate assent or agreement or confirmation
examples: The teacher nodded when the student gave the right answer

definitions.text: let the head fall forward through drowsiness
examples: The old man was nodding in his chair

definitions.text: sway gently back and forth, as in a nodding motion
examples: the flowers were nodding in the breeze
The old man sat nodding by the fireplace
